column3: Create a data monitoring plan for each building to track building improvements; Prepare an Energy Action Plan.
column4:
1. Meet to discuss project goals.
2. Collect baseline data.
3. Create a data monitoring plan.
4. Complete on-site assessments.
5. Prepare a draft Energy Action Plan.
6. Present the draft plan for feedback.
7. Revise and finalize the plan.
8. Provide the final plan to the Tribe.
column5: Tribe, CCHRC (Cold Climate Housing Research Center), Energy Audits of Alaska, building staff
